GoldFire Studios | Oklahoma City | ONSITE | Community Manager FULLTIME

We are a small game studio building massively multiplayer games for the web. We've got several successful games on the market and are looking to bring a full-time community manager to further advance our community elements within and around our games. You'll be interacting directly with players, running events, formulating plans to make the community better and in general making sure everyone is having a great time.

Learn more and apply at https://stowhire.com/goldfire-studios/community-manager
